Slice(String, Nullable<Int32>, Nullable<Int32>, Int32)

Returns a Python-like string slice that is between the specified boundaries and takes characters by the specified step.

Declaration
public static string Slice(this string source, int? start = default(int? ), int? stop = default(int? ), int step = 1)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String source
System.Nullable<System.Int32> start

The starting index of the slice. Loops around if negative.
System.Nullable<System.Int32> stop

The index the slice goes up to, excluding itself. Loops around if negative.
System.Int32 step

The increment between each character index. Traverses backwards if negative.
Returns
Type Description
System.String
